sentences.english: One critic described the new songs as lovely, thoughtful, and agreeable.
sentences.chinese: 一位评论家形容为可爱，体贴，和和气气的新的歌曲。

sentences.english: How many lovers can part as friends?
sentences.chinese: 又有多少情侣能和和气气地分手呢？
